data.comment: The match has started, with Alkmaar kicking-off.
Own goal! Zakaria Aboukhlal scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
In the minute 35, Willem II have been given a penalty at AFAS Stadion...
Willem II are going well in Alkmaar. They now lead 0-2 thanks to a Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye penalty.
Teun Koopmeiners keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
In the minute 43, Teun Koopmeiners is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Great play from Jesper Karlsson to set up the goal.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, Willem II have kicked-off the second half at AFAS Stadion.
Goal! Alkmaar have got their heads in front thanks to a Calvin Stengs strike.
Teun Koopmeiners instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 65, Great finish from Fredrik Midtsjo to give Alkmaar a 4-2 lead.
Owen Wijndal with an assist there.
The away team replace Wesley Spieringhs with Che Nunnely.
Alkmaar have been given a penalty...
In the minute 69, Derrick Kohn (Willem II) gets a yellow card.
Alkmaar have extended their lead to 5-2 courtesy of a Jesper Karlsson penalty.
In the minute 75, Adrie Koster (Willem II) is making a second substitution, with Mats Kohlert replacing Kwasi Okyere Wriedt.
Pascal Jansen is making the team's first substitution at AFAS Stadion with Ferdy Druijf replacing Jesper Karlsson.
Hakon Evjen is replacing Zakaria Aboukhlal for the home team.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Yukinari Sugawara with Tijani Reijnders. This is the third substitution made today by Pascal Jansen.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 5-3.
Willem II are back in the match in Alkmaar. Che Nunnely has scored to make it 5-3.
